targets.expr: sum by(country) (count_over_time({container="geoblock"} | json country="source_country", status="request_status" | status = `allowed` [$__auto]))
sum by(country) (count_over_time({container="geoblock"} | json country="source_country", status="request_status" | status = `denied` [$__auto]))
sum by(domain) (rate({container="geoblock"} | json domain="request_domain", status="request_status", local="source_is_local" | status = `$status` | local =~ `$clients` [$__auto])) * 60

sum by(source) (rate({container="geoblock"} | json source="source_ip", country="source_country", status="request_status", local="source_is_local" | status = `$status` | local =~ `$clients` [$__auto])) * 60
sum by(country) (count_over_time({container="geoblock"} | json country="source_country", status="request_status" | country != `` | status = `$status` [$__auto]))
sum by(org) (count_over_time({container="geoblock"} | json org="source_org", status="request_status" | org != `` | status = `$status` [$__auto]))
